items.title: Fiserv execs bet $1.5 million on a turnaround, and the stock pops
items.description: Two executives just bought stock in the S&P 500’s weakest performer of the year.

items.title: Our kids are grown. It’s time to cancel our Chase Disney Visa. What’s a good credit card for middle age?
items.description: “The card served its purpose while our kids were young.”

items.title: ‘She’s young enough to be his granddaughter’: My dad, 85, is being seduced by his caregiver. What can I do?
items.description: “He is of sound mind, but he might succumb to someone who offers him companionship.”
